user_query: I am planning a dinner party and I need to find nutritional information for various foods. Can you help me search for foods using keywords like 'chicken', 'broccoli', and 'rice'? I would like the results to include the brand owner 'XYZ Foods' and display 10 foods per page. Additionally, please provide me with the nutritional information for the food with FDC ID 1497465.

TaskList.description: Search for foods using the keywords 'chicken', 'broccoli', and 'rice' while filtering the results to include only those from the brand owner 'XYZ Foods' and displaying 10 foods per page.
Retrieve the nutritional information for the specific food item with FDC ID 1497465.
